accountDeletion_confirm_content_title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
accountDeletion_confirm_content_text: For security purposes, please enter your password.
accountDeletion_successful_content_title:
Your account is
marked for deletion
accountDeletion_successful_content_text:
You have successfully marked your account for deletion. Your account will be permanently deleted in the next few hours.

You are now being logged out.
deleteAccount_content_title: Do you want to delete your account?
deleteAccount_content_text:
You will no longer be able to make bookings, get recommendations based on your preferences, or set favorites.

Your existing budget will expire. Deleting cannot be reversed.
deleteAccount_content_link: For more information about deleting the account, see the FAQs
eid_iosScanDialog_sessionStarted: Hold your ID under the top half of your phone.
eid_iosScanDialog_sessionSucceeded: Your ID card was successfully scanned.
eid_pin_faq_link:
Where can I find my PIN?
For more information, see the FAQs.
eid_can_faq_link:
Where can I find my CAN?
For more information, see the FAQs.
eid_aboutVerification_image_alt: An ID card with a checkmark
eid_aboutVerification_content_title: You will need one of the following ID documents
eid_aboutServiceProvider_subtitle: You would like to prove your identity to the following provider:
eid_aboutServiceProvider_accessRights_su: By entering your PIN, you grant the provider access to the following data on your ID card.
eid_aboutVerification_content_text: Before we can activate your budget, we need you to successfully complete the identification process. The upcoming steps will guide you through it.
eid_cancel_flow_text:
You can restart the identification process at any time.

If you've forgotten your PIN, you can request a new one here.
eid_document_germandID: ID card with online ID function for German citizens
eid_document_nonEuID: Electronic residence permit for non-EU citizens
eid_aboutVerification_faq_link: For more information about identification, see the FAQs.
eid_aboutVerification_dataprivacy_link: Link to the detailed privacy policy
eid_aboutVerification_accept_text: By clicking "Agree", you give us consent to read and process data from your identification document as described in the privacy policy after you have entered your PIN. You can find the data protection information here:
eid_insertCard_image_alt: An ID card behind the top of a cell phone
eid_insertCard_content_text: Now place your ID card against the back of your smartphone. Half of the card should still be visible above the top of the phone.
eid_insertCard_faq_link: For more information about identification with the online ID function, see the FAQs.
eid_pinView_content_text: Have you already created your own 6-digit PIN? Then enter it here.
eid_pinView_notChanged_text: Haven't changed the PIN from the PIN letter yet?
eid_canView_content_text: You've entered your PIN wrong twice. Before a third attempt, you must first enter your access number (CAN). The CAN is the 6-digit number on the front of your ID card (to the right of the expiry date).
eid_transportPinView_content_text: You also received a PIN letter with your ID card. This is called a transport PIN. With this transport PIN you can also confirm your identity online using your identity card. Enter the PIN from the PIN letter here.
eid_newPinView_content_text: Assign your own PIN so you can use the ID card online.
eid_newPinView_confirmNewPin_pinNotMatch: The two PIN numbers do not match.
eid_verificationCompletion_content_text:
Your budget has now been activated.
Have fun with it!
eid_changePinCompletion_content_text:
You have successfully changed your PIN and can confirm your identity with your new PIN.

In the future, you will always be able to use this PIN for the online identification function.
eid_startVerify_button_text: Confirm your identity to get your budget.
eid_nfcNotSupported_content_title: Your smartphone does not support NFC.
eid_nfcNotSupported_content_text: You can find alternative options in the FAQs.
eid_nfcNotSupported_content_link: You can find more information about identification with the online ID function in the FAQs.
favorites_item_remove_a11y_label: Click here to remove it from favorites
favorites_no_favorites_hint: You can see your favorites here
favorites_unauthorized_no_favorites_titl: Log in to see your favorites
favorites_unauthorized_no_favorites_hint: Once you’re logged in, you'll be able to see your favorites, edit them, and add new ones here.
favorites_empty_no_favorites_hint: You can see your favorites here.
login_form_noAccount_text: And you're 18? Then register here to activate your budget!
onboarding_aboutApp_content_text:
We want to give you the opportunity to experience local culture with a budget of <bold>200 €</bold>. Use the app to find offers near you.

When using the app, technically required cookies are used. Details and further information on data protection can be found in our privacy policy:
onboarding_aboutApp_dpsLink: Link to the detailed privacy policy
onboarding_aboutApp_image_alt: A book, musical notes, a CD, an picture, and a clapperboard float around the app
onboarding_locationPermission_content_te:
<bold>Enter your location!</bold> In order to show you suitable cultural offers near you, we would like to use your location data while you're using the app.

If you don't want us to use your location data, you can enter your postal code instead, which will then be used to search for cultural offers.

You can change this setting at any time in your profile.
onboarding_locationPermission_dpsLink: Link to the detailed privacy policy
onboarding_notificationPermission_conten: <bold>Always stay up to date!</bold> Allow notifications so we can always tell you the latest news.
productDetail_offer_accessibility_featur: Wheelchair-accessible toilet at the pickup location
No wheelchair-accessible toilet at the pickup location
productDetail_offer_accessibility_noOthe: No further information. If you have any questions, please contact the provider directly.
productDetail_getProductDetailError_mess: An error occurred while opening the product.
productDetail_confirmReservation_consent: By confirming with “Book Now”, you are making a booking for the offer shown above.
Link to the detailed privacy policy
productDetail_reservationError_message: An error occurred while booking the product.
reservationDetail_qrCode_hint: You can redeem this QR code with the provider specified below.
reservationDetail_footer_refunds: Of the total price of {{totalWithoutRefunds}}, {{refundAmount}} has been returned to you
reservationDetail_header_deliveryScenari: Your booking has been received, but has not yet been accepted by the provider.
Your booking is being delivered. You will be notified by email when your product is ready to be picked up.
This booking is ready to be picked up. You can show this code to the seller. If you want to cancel the booking now, please contact the seller.
Redeem the voucher with the provider. If you want to cancel the booking now, please contact the seller.
Your order has been picked up.
Your order has been picked up.
Your booking has been canceled. This can happen if you cancel or if the dealer has not accepted the booking.
reservations_no_reservations_hint: Here you can see your booking
reservations_unauthorized_no_reservation: Sign in to see your bookings
Log in to see your bookings here.
reservations_list_noPendingItems_content: You can see your bookings here. Use pull-to-refresh to refresh the display.
reservations_list_noCompletedItems_conte: You haven't made a booking yet
registration_success_todo_information: In the next step, you can confirm your identity. This will activate your budget.
registration_consent_headline: Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
registration_consent_eula_headline: Please accept the EULA and acknowledge the data protection information.
registration_consent_eula_copytext: In order to register, you must agree to the current terms of use (EULA). The EULA contains framework conditions and the contractual basis for using the app. You can access them here and at any time on your profile:
registration_consent_data_privacy_copyte: In the privacy policy, we explain to you which data we collect and process for which purposes when using the app. Please acknowledge this data protection information, which you can also access at any time on your profile:
registration_consent_data_privacy_linkte: Link to the detailed privacy policy
registration_consent_data_privacy_checkb: I have read the data protection information.
registration_data_privacy_introtext: To create your profile, we only process essential data from you:
registration_data_privacy_item3: Your name, if you specify it
registration_data_privacy_item4: Your date of birth, if you specify it
registration_data_privacy_item5: Your favorites, if you specify them
registration_data_privacy_item6: Your postal code, if you specify it
registration_data_privacy_copytext:
By confirming with “Agree”, you declare the following:

<extrabold>“I consent to you processing my personal data for the creation of a user account as described in the privacy policy under the heading “Registration”</extrabold>

You can find information on how to revoke your consent statement in the privacy policy under “Registration”.
registration_data_privacy_linktext: Link to the detailed privacy policy
registration_data_privacy_cancel_dialog_: Do you want to cancel the registration? You can still register another time.
registration_cancel_alert_title: Are you sure you want to cancel?
registration_cancel_alert_text: Your entries have not yet been saved. You are not registered yet.
registration_preferences_cancel_alert_ti: Are you sure you want to cancel?
registration_preferences_cancel_alert_te: Your preferences are not yet saved. This means we can't make any suitable recommendations.
form_error_password_min_length: Password is too short. The password must be at least {{minLength}} characters long.
form_error_password_character_groups: Password too weak. The password must contain at least {{count}} different characters.
preferences_location: If you have not specified your location, you can enter your postal code here instead. This allows us to tell you about more suitable cultural offers.
preferences_your_preferences_description: Complete your profile so that we can make more suitable recommendations for you.
forgotPassword_copytext: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPasswordSuccess_copytext: We have sent a link to the email address you gave. You can use this link to set a new password.
cdc_invalid_loginid_message: Login not possible because the email and password combination is invalid
account_verification_description: Please confirm your email address to continue the registration process.
account_verification_description_success: Email sent. If you haven't received it, you can try again in 1 minute.
cancellation_confirmation_alert_title: Are you sure you want to cancel?
cancellation_confirmation_alert_descript: Are you sure you want to cancel your order?
not_yet_entitled_button_text: Have a browse! You won’t get your budget until you’re 18, but until then you can get inspired and set favorites.
verification_duplicate_text: Your budget could not be activated because there is already a user with your identification data. Please refer to the <faqLink>FAQs</faqLink> for instructions on how to proceed.
webview_error_noInternet_subtitle: You are not connected to the internet at the moment.
